title: 最近的自动取款机在哪儿

conversations.english: Pam, where's the closest ATM?帕姆，最近的自动取款机在哪儿？
conversations.chinese: 帕姆，最近的自动取款机在哪儿？
conversations.reply_english: It's not that far. Do you see that Yellow building over there?不远，你看到那边的那个黄色建筑了吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 不远，你看到那边的那个黄色建筑了吗？

title: 去动物园在这里搭公车吗

conversations.english: Excuse me. Is this where I catch the bus for the zoo?打扰了。我要去动物园在这里搭公车可以吗？
conversations.chinese: 打扰了。我要去动物园在这里搭公车可以吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well,you can take the No.36 bus from here, but then you have to walk about 30 minutes.额，你可以从这里搭36路车，但是之后你必须走30分钟左右。
conversations.reply_chinese: 额，你可以从这里搭36路车，但是之后你必须走30分钟左右。

title: 这路公车去新书店吗

conversations.english: Excuse me, does this bus go to the new bookstore?打扰了，这路公车去新书店吗？
conversations.chinese: 打扰了，这路公车去新书店吗？
conversations.reply_english: No,you'll have to get off at the bank,and take a No.50.不，你必须在银行那里下车，然后搭50路公车。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，你必须在银行那里下车，然后搭50路公车。

title: 我想去医院看苏珊

conversations.english: Where are you going,Jane?简，你要去哪里？
conversations.chinese: 简，你要去哪里？
conversations.reply_english: I'm going to the hospital to see Susan.我想去医院看苏珊。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想去医院看苏珊。

title: 去第82街要多久

conversations.english: Excuse me, do the buses stop here?打扰了，公车在这里停吗？
conversations.chinese: 打扰了，公车在这里停吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, they all stop at this corner.是的，他们都在这个角落停。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，他们都在这个角落停。

title: 去校医室怎么走

conversations.english: Excuse me, could you tell me how to get to the school clinic? I've lost my way.打扰了，你能告诉我如何去校医室吗？我迷路了。
conversations.chinese: 打扰了，你能告诉我如何去校医室吗？我迷路了。
conversations.reply_english: Yes. Go straight ahead till you come to the traffic lights, turn left there and it's the first turnning on the right.是的。一直往前走，直到你到达交通灯，在那里向左转，医务室就在第一个拐角处的右边了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。一直往前走，直到你到达交通灯，在那里向左转，医务室就在第一个拐角处的右边了。

title: 最近的加油站在哪里

conversations.english: Excuse me, where is the nearest gas station?打扰了，最近的加油站在哪里？
conversations.chinese: 打扰了，最近的加油站在哪里？
conversations.reply_english: Go along this street to the traffic lights.沿着这条路走到交通灯那里。
conversations.reply_chinese: 沿着这条路走到交通灯那里。

title: 去火车站怎么走

conversations.english: Excuse me, but could you tell me the way to the railway station?打扰了，你可以告诉我去火车站怎么走吗？
conversations.chinese: 打扰了，你可以告诉我去火车站怎么走吗？
conversations.reply_english: The railway station? Just go down this street and turn left at the second corner. The station is at the end of that street.火车站？沿着这条街向南走，在第二个拐弯处向左转，火车站就在那条街的末尾处。
conversations.reply_chinese: 火车站？沿着这条街向南走，在第二个拐弯处向左转，火车站就在那条街的末尾处。

title: 您能告诉我怎么去北京大学吗

conversations.english: Excuse me,could you tell me where Peking University is on this map?打扰了，您可以告诉我在这张地图上北京大学在哪里吗？
conversations.chinese: 打扰了，您可以告诉我在这张地图上北京大学在哪里吗？
conversations.reply_english: Let me see. Here it is.让我看看。它在这里。
conversations.reply_chinese: 让我看看。它在这里。

title: 请问去邮局怎么走

conversations.english: Excuse me,can you tell me where the post office is?打扰一下,请问邮局在哪儿?
conversations.chinese: 打扰一下,请问邮局在哪儿?
conversations.reply_english: It's on the Fifth Avenue.在第五大街.
conversations.reply_chinese: 在第五大街.

title: 请问到假日旅店怎么走

conversations.english: Can you direct me to Holiday inn?请问到假日旅店怎么走?
conversations.chinese: 请问到假日旅店怎么走?
conversations.reply_english: Cross the street and walk two blocks west.You can't miss it.在第二个交通灯那儿过马路就到了.
conversations.reply_chinese: 在第二个交通灯那儿过马路就到了.

title: 请问海军上将旅馆怎么走

conversations.english: Excuse me. Do you know where the Admiral Hotel is?对不起，你知道海军上将旅馆在哪儿？
conversations.chinese: 对不起，你知道海军上将旅馆在哪儿？
conversations.reply_english: That's over on Callaway Street,isn't it?那是在卡来威街，不是吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 那是在卡来威街，不是吗？

title: 请问洗手间在哪里 Where is the toilet

conversations.english: By the way miss, where is the toilet?顺便问一下，洗手间在哪里？
conversations.chinese: 顺便问一下，洗手间在哪里？
conversations.reply_english: Toilets are in the rear, I am afraid all the toilets are fully occupied at the moment.洗手间在后面，恐怕此刻所有厕所都满了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 洗手间在后面，恐怕此刻所有厕所都满了。

title: 你能告诉我银行在哪儿吗

conversations.english: Excuse me，Miss，can you tell me where the bank is?打扰一下，小姐，你能告诉我银行在哪儿吗？
conversations.chinese: 打扰一下，小姐，你能告诉我银行在哪儿吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes，the bus doesn’t go there directly.You have to take the No．26 bus for five stops and then change to a No．16 bus and get off at the third stop.When you get off，you can see the bank．可以，但是车不能直接到那儿你得坐5站26路公共汽车，然后换乘16路公共汽车，在第三站下车后你就能看到这家银行了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 可以，但是车不能直接到那儿你得坐5站26路公共汽车，然后换乘16路公共汽车，在第三站下车后你就能看到这家银行了。

title: 请问这附近有书店吗

conversations.english: Is there a bookstore near here?附近有书店吗?
conversations.chinese: 附近有书店吗?
conversations.reply_english: Yes,it's straight ahead around the corner.有,就在前面的拐角处.
conversations.reply_chinese: 有,就在前面的拐角处.

title: 请画张地图给我好吗 Drop me a map

conversations.english: Excuse me, would you tell me how to return to Hilton Hotel. I'm afraid I lost my way.对不起，请你告诉我怎样回希尔顿饭店好吗？我恐怕迷路了。
conversations.chinese: 对不起，请你告诉我怎样回希尔顿饭店好吗？我恐怕迷路了。
conversations.reply_english: Did you have hotel card or something?你有饭店名片或其他东西吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你有饭店名片或其他东西吗？

title: 顺便问一下医院是在书店旁边吗

conversations.english: Excuse me，could you tell me the bookshop’s address?对不起，你能告诉我这个书店的地址吗？
conversations.chinese: 对不起，你能告诉我这个书店的地址吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes，the bookshop is just around the corner．Turn left and you’ll see the bookshop．当然，书店离此不远就在转角处向左拐你就能看到。
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，书店离此不远就在转角处向左拐你就能看到。

title: 请进一步说明Asking for clarification

conversations.english: Excuse me, How do I get to the Grand hotel?对不起,请问到圆山大饭店怎么走？
conversations.chinese: 对不起,请问到圆山大饭店怎么走？
conversations.reply_english: I am sorry , I didn’t catch what you said. Could you repeat it please?对不起，我没听懂你说的话，可以请你再说一遍吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 对不起，我没听懂你说的话，可以请你再说一遍吗？

title: 我来给你带路好了

conversations.english: Excuse me, you look lost.Can I help you?抱歉，你好像迷路了，需要帮忙吗?
conversations.chinese: 抱歉，你好像迷路了，需要帮忙吗?
conversations.reply_english: Oh,Thank you. I'm looking for the train station.噢，谢谢，我正在找火车站.
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，谢谢，我正在找火车站.

title: 请问购物中心要怎么走

conversations.english: Excuse me. I'm looking for Bluemingdails. Could you tell me how to get there?我在找Bluemingdails购物中心，你可以告诉我该怎么去吗？
conversations.chinese: 我在找Bluemingdails购物中心，你可以告诉我该怎么去吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure. It's very close actually.You go straight down this road. Then you turn left, at the next junction.当然，事实上离这里很近。你沿着这条路走下去，然后在下个路口左转。
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，事实上离这里很近。你沿着这条路走下去，然后在下个路口左转。

title: 我迷路了I'm completely lost

conversations.english: Excuse me, I wonder if you can help me.对不起，不知道可不可以请你帮个忙。
conversations.chinese: 对不起，不知道可不可以请你帮个忙。
conversations.reply_english: Sure. What's up?当然，什么事？
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，什么事？

title: 到花旗银行应该怎么走

conversations.english: Sorry to trouble you. Can you tell me how to get to the City Bank?麻烦您一下,到花旗银行怎么走?
conversations.chinese: 麻烦您一下,到花旗银行怎么走?
conversations.reply_english: It's about two or there blocks away from here.离这儿有两三个街区.
conversations.reply_chinese: 离这儿有两三个街区.
